Name: Battle Bears 1: Zombies
About the game: Battle Bears 1: Zombies, the first of the BB trilogy games, is a wave-based shooter that stars OLIVER, a teddy bear stuck behind enemy lines who must fight off unending waves of pink and deadly bears, strange flying mares, and of course, ZOMBIES! Load up your guns, grab your unicorn horns, and fortify your sandbags as your childhood nostalgia is back on PC! EASY TO PLAY: Move the mouse to aim and left click to fire. SILLY CUTSCENES: Enjoy the original cutscenes and relive the old wacky story of Oliver and the Mystical Treasures. BIZARRE BOSSES: Your old foes are back and as odd as ever! They're big, they're bad, and some of them have quite a nice acapella voice!
